description.en:
Skylightexchange is a Decentralized automated Market-making (AMM) Protocol that is based on Binance smart chain (BSC). The Skiylight Token is a native Bep-20 governance Token on the Skylightexchange platform.

Users have the ability to earn Skylight Tokens by providing liquidity on skylightexchange and hodlers can use their Skylight Token for Buy-back contrcat call and receive transaction fee Dividends.

the rewards are offered in Skylight. Skylight holders can purchase goods and services at Skylight E-commerce site with more discount and stand a chance to win monthly customers rewards
